entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
